BDR.description: Allows you to execute code between the rendering of each scan line.

BOOT.description: Is called a single time when your cartridge is booted

OVR.description: The OVR callback is the final step in rendering a frame.

SCN.description: (Deprecated) Allows you to execute code between the rendering of each scan line.

TIC.description: The TIC function is the 'main' update/draw callback and must be present in every program.
